TopicTitle: UI - Quit to desktop from pause menu.

Articles.Content:
It's a small thing, but it's always been a pet peeve of mine when a game makes me click all the way back to the main menu to exit. KSP is a particularly bad offender: In flight -> Space Center -> Saved Game menu -> Main Menu -> Exit, with either a loading screen or a not-quite-short-enough animation between each.

My suggestion is simple, and while I'm no programmer I can't imagine it would be difficult to implement: Add a "quit to desktop" button to the pause menu.

That's all I have. Thanks Squad, and keep up the good work!
I'm using the X button. Or you can press Alt+F4. I heard it's safe in Space Center although I usually do it after I return to the menu.

Maybe a way of doing this could be to have the quit to desktop option available any time you can quicksave. When you quit, it could do a quicksave and tag that save file with a "ask whether the user would like to resume" flag. Present a dialog when that save is next loaded, and you can bypass the KSC screen to go directly to the last flight.
